thread.section_title: Public Storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Public Storage | publicstorage.com | 16 of 585
thread.title: Margaret Deck
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Margaret Deck

author: Margaret Deck
title: Margaret Deck
text:
The building is modern and well-lit inside. The office has flatbed handtrucks for use in by tenants. I believe that all units have inside hallway access which deters small animals from getting inside the storage units. Street access is difficult because the entrance driveway is available only from southbound travel on a busy road. There is limited parking near the office.
I did not like having to purchase a specialty "cylinder lock" that may have limited use elsewhere.
